refnamediv.refname: Tests in org.openscience.cdk.test Use Same Directory Structure as Tested Classes

refsect1.title: Proposal
refsect1.para: The test classes in org.openscience.cdk.test follow the same directory structures as the classes which are tested.
Example: The class cdk.io.XYZReader is tested in a class cdk.test.io.XYZReaderTest.

refsect1.title: Reason
refsect1.para: Directory org/openscience/cdk/test is getting clouded by many classes.
